https://github.com/itext/itextpdf //Help Dialog You can reach a short help dialog on every tab by pressing menu -> help.

Menu
Share: you can share the last manipulated PDF.
Open PDF: open the last PDF with a PDF viewer.
Open Folder: open the application directory with a file explorer.
Settings: check it out.
Help: open the help dialog for each tab.

Nice to know
At the bottom you can see the name of the actual PDF and the format. By pressing this area you can switch between portrait and landscape format for your PDF page. //Create image Dialog What can I do here?
Here you can create a single PDF page from a picture.

Buttons
From top to bottom on the right side.

• Camera: you can choose your picture. Nether from the gallery or take a new one with the camera.
• Crop: Crop and rotate the image.
• Edit: make a few basic enhancements.
• FAB (pink): create the PDF.

Nice to know
At the bottom you can see the name of the actual PDF and the format. By pressing this area you can switch between portrait and landscape format for your PDF page. //Add image Dialog What can I do here?
Here you can add a page with an image to an existing PDF file.

Buttons
From top to bottom on the right side.

• Camera: you can choose your picture. Nether from the gallery or take a new one with the camera.
• Crop: Crop and rotate the image.
• Edit: make a few basic enhancements.
• PDF: choose the PDF on which your new page will be added.
• FAB (pink): create the PDF.

Nice to know
At the bottom you can see the name of the actual PDF and the format. By pressing this area you can switch between portrait and landscape format for your PDF page. //Create text Dialog What can I do here?
Here you can create a single PDF page from text.

Buttons
• FAB (pink): create the PDF.

Nice to know
At the bottom you can see the name of the actual PDF and the format. By pressing this area you can switch between portrait and landscape format for your PDF page. //Add text Dialog What can I do here?
Here you can add a page with text to an existing PDF file.

Buttons
From top to bottom on the right side.

• Delete: delete pages from an existing PDF.
• Merge: merge two PDF files.
• Protect: protect an existing PDF with a password. You can set an owner and an user password. You can change them in the settings or by long pressing this button.
• Meta data: edit the meta data of an existing PDF. You can edit the meta data in the settings or by long pressing this button.
• Image: convert PDF to images.
• PDF: choose the PDF which you will manipulate.
• FAB (pink): create the PDF.

Nice to know
At the bottom you can see the name of the actual PDF and the format. By pressing this area you can switch between portrait and landscape format for your PDF page.
